channel.title: Kickass Client v2 [PUBLIC RELEASE]
channel.description:
I have decided to release a basic client for people who are newer to servers and need a nice looking client.
What I did-
- Fixed Crowns - Cleaned up Codes - Fixed Stability of client
You can add links to your site and other sites like youtube into the client, the same site links that were originally implemented into the client are still there.
Before you can use the client, you must take all of the files out of the 'Stat icon' and 'Red Stone' folder and move them to the 'Sprites' folder. This is to stop noobs who do absolutely nothing before using the client.
Download Link: http://www.multiupload.com/U2OFWADMR6
[img]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/2361/client2.jpg[/img] [img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/2733/client1i.jpg[/img]

@Border2k wrote:

I have decided to release a basic client for people who are newer to servers and need a nice looking client.

What I did-

  • Fixed Stability of client

You can add links to your site and other sites like youtube into the client, the same site links that were originally implemented into the client are still there.

Before you can use the client, you must take all of the files out of the ‘Stat icon’ and ‘Red Stone’ folder and move them to the ‘Sprites’ folder. This is to stop noobs who do absolutely nothing before using the client.
